title: The role of youth in achieving peace in Colombia.
description: How do young people organize for peace in the longest ongoing conflict in the world? Two young Colombians will share their perspective of the conflict, and how they actively work for a peaceful society in line with the 2030 Agenda.
extendedDescription:
Peace, justice and strong institutions. A seminar with goal 16 of the 2030 Agenda for sustainable development in focus. 

The population of young adults is today bigger than ever, and it is of great importance to include young people in peaceful processes to achieve a sustainable world in peace. 

Two young Colombians will lead the seminar by giving their perception of the conflict and peace process. They have great experience from organizing youth towards peace, non-violence and equality. What changes has been made? How have they been affected by the process? What are the challenges for the future?

The seminar will be translated from Spanish to English.
